title: Background play exit the Music, and the synchronization of lyrics
answer:
1. Background Play: Enter into Music + Player>Play any audio file>Press back or home key during the play. 

 2. Exit the Music: In the Music Playback interface, click the ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109975) button, and then press the back or home button to exit the music + application.
